summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEXUS Supply Chain OS with ephemeral UI paradigm. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI working excellently with dynamic component generation, all 5 AI agents operational, and GPT-5.2 integration successful.

integration_issues.issue: Blockchain ledger widget not displaying when 'Blockchain ledger' command is used

passed_tests: All 13 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
NEXUS header and system status display
All 5 agent chips with status indicators
Agent cards with metrics and confidence levels
Risk alerts widget with 3 alert items
Dark futuristic theme with cyan/purple accents
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Investigate LLM command mapping for 'Blockchain ledger' command to ensure blockchain widget displays correctly
